CombatSkin.lbl_0: The room has been disbanded, please return to the lobby!

CPopupSkin.lbl_0: Do you issue a quick battle request ?
CPopupSkin.lbl_1: If the opponent agrees, will skip the battle flow, directly to the settlement!
CPopupSkin.lbl_2: (A maximum of 3 applications can be made per game)
CPopupSkin.lbl_3:
Do you agree to the prompt settlement request from your counterparty?
If you agree to the request, you will skip the battle process and  directly to the battle settlement.
CPopupSkin.lbl_4: The opponent agrees to settle quickly, the game is about to settle!
CPopupSkin.lbl_5: Opponent refuses to settle quickly, game continues!
